hero.tagline: A <role></role> passionate about creating innovative and scalable solutions and exploring new technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.bio: Hi! I'm Vincenzo, a Computer Science student at the University of Bari Aldo Moro. My main goal is to continuously expand my technical skills. I have a solid foundation in programming, algorithms, and data structures, especially in OOP languages like Java. My curiosity has led me towards web development, where I now experiment with JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and related tools. I use Node.js for server-side logic and Git for impeccable version control.

contacts.title: Get In Touch
contacts.subtitle: Have a project in mind or just want to say hi?
contacts.description: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Don't hesitate to reach out!

footer.privacyNote: This site uses anonymized analytics to improve user experience. No personal data is collected or shared with third parties.
